items.title: Taskly PME
items.description: Complete intervention management and scheduling tool for SMEs.
items.longDescription: Taskly SME is a SaaS solution designed to optimize the operations of small and medium-sized enterprises. It allows for intervention planning, real-time technician tracking, and detailed report generation.

items.title: Slate Peed'z
items.description: Pizza ordering platform with real-time tracking.
items.longDescription: A seamless online ordering experience for a local pizzeria. Integration of a secure payment system and an interactive map for delivery tracking.

items.title: Café Paris Lomé
items.description: Elegant website and digital menu for a prestigious restaurant.
items.longDescription: Creation of a showcase website highlighting the restaurant's ambiance and cuisine. Development of a QR code accessible menu with easy updates for staff.

items.title: Wings Shake
items.longDescription: A lightweight and fast web application for 'click and collect' ordering. Integration with Firebase for real-time order management by the restaurant.
